amendment.description: To limit suspicious activity reporting requirements to requests from law enforcement agencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 365 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 347.
Motion to table amendment SA 365 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 4. Record Vote Number: 83.
Proposed amendment SA 365, not having 60 votes in opposition to the motion to table, was withdrawn in Senate.
